Profile
I'm a Computer Science (BS) student at Cornell University with a Minor in Artificial Intelligence (GPA: 3.5+, Dean's List). I have internship experience at Amazon Web Services, Samsung SDS, and American Express where I built scalable backend systems, automation pipelines, and NLP models. I focus on systems engineering, ML/NLP, and reliable production deployments — seeking SWE & ML internships or early-career roles.
